title: 學生租場玩粉塵　場主嬲爆善後　網民轟危險

replies.msg:
學生租場玩粉塵 場主嬲爆善後 網民轟危險

https://bit.ly/2OnZRoV


人類總要重覆犯錯？


粉塵意外頻生，學生唔知驚？網上流傳有學生租用室內場地大玩粉塵派對，危險之餘亦弄髒地方，令場主非常不滿，到底所為何事？

有爆料者於Facebook專頁「活動策劃奇案 之 業界惡霸 - Event n Production Secret」投稿，投訴一間教育機構租用場地舉辦學生活動時，起初僅稱「玩少少顏料」，豈料最終大玩粉塵派對，令場地面目全非！

爆料者怒不可遏：「塵嚟的！搞到人哋全公司都係！入晒木地板入晒冷氣入曬窗簾要搵師傅清！入咗電器燒左會爆炸㗎！比啲常識啦，有冇讀過書的」！

租出場地的三製作（香港）有限公司回覆《港呢啲》查詢時表示，參加活動的學生事後逗留約6小時協助清潔，並償付2,200港元作冷氣機的清潔費，「但其他嘅清潔費用係冇畀嘅…佢哋嗰日係盡量抹啦，但好老實，我哋個場係無可能就咁抹到，因為我哋有木地板，同埋啲粉塵飛到周圍都係啦。」負責人說，總清潔費用近一萬元，惟對方沒有承擔。

涉事教育機構互文教社則回覆指，當日活動是由學生自發舉辦，該機構只提供資金予學生舉辦活動。發言人指，學生們已按場地負責人要求清潔現場，並無逃避責任之意，並直至負責人同意才於凌晨1點45分離開。

發言人指，學生事前已通知場地負責人，指有機會弄污場地，並質疑場地負責人為何沒有即時阻止活動進行。

浸會大學宿舍去年11月發生塵爆，引起全城關注。香港科技大學化學系講師陳鈞傑接受東網訪問時曾指出，粉塵爆炸起火成因不在於火種大小，即使麵粉原本屬於非可燃物質，但若大規模揚起，微細粉末暴露於空氣中並與氧氣混合，則會轉變成大面積可燃物質，一旦物質表面受熱則會急速反應引發爆炸，「就好似煤氣洩漏一樣，只需要一兩點火星，都會造成瞬間爆炸」。
點過火就玩撚完

當日參加者身上沾滿粉塵。（互聯網）

Members

ICEGAP members not only have the chance to take part in cultural exchange activities but also participate in exclusive events, enjoy discounts on ICEGAP events, and gain free access to ICE trainings and educational programmes. The valuable opportunity to work at a non-profit and getting hands-on experience with a diverse network of people allow us to expand our interests hone our communication as well as leadership skills, in turns equipping us for shaping the society.

As we all come from different backgrounds and schools, each of us takes up the important role of a messenger to help spread ICEGAP’s views and values to our peers, nurturing their love of learning about the world and its cultures and therefore offering all Hong Kong’s students’ a chance to reach out to the world and understand it.

List of schools of members, in alphabetical order:

Belilios Public School
Carmel Pak U Secondary School
Cheung Sha Wan Catholic Secondary School
City University of Hong Kong
Diocesan Boys’ School
Diocesan Girls’ School
Heep Yunn School
Madam Lau Kam Lung Secondary School of Miu Fat Buddhist Monastery
Marymount Secondary School
Queen Elizabeth School
Raimondi College
Renaissance College
Sacred Heart Canossian College
Sheng Kung Hui Lam Woo Memorial Secondary School
Shung Tak Catholic English College
South Island School
St. Joseph’s College
St. Margaret’s Girls’ College, Hong Kong
St. Paul’s School (Lam Tin)
St. Stephen’s College
The Chinese Foundation Secondary School
The Church of Christ in China Ming Kei College
The Chinese University of Hong Kong
True Light Girls’ College
Tsuen Wan Government Secondary School
Tung Wah College
Tung Wah Group of Hospitals Kap Yan Directors’ College
Tung Wah Group of Hospitals Lo Kon Ting Memorial College
Ying Wa Girls’ School
Youth College (Yeo Chei Man)
YMCA of Hong Kong Christian College
